info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 32271
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 32271
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	299	IN	MX	20 mx2.alwaysdata.com.
mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	299	IN	MX	10 mx1.alwaysdata.com.

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 58258
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 58258
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:_spf.alwaysdata.com ?all"

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 63099
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 63099
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns2.alwaysdata.com.
mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns1.alwaysdata.com.
